name: Sniper Assassin 3D Shooter 2
description:
Best shooting game ready for you. Download now for free.

Choose your sniper weapon and start hunting your enemies.

Addictive shooting and fps game, Sniper Assassin 3D Shooter 2018. Many new features waiting for you.

The city in very difficult situation. The criminal people and gangs are everywhere. The city needs to a hero. Take your sniper, aim and shoot.

Clean the city, kill every single crime person. Save the innocent people. War is coming. Gangs very powerful.

If you like the gun and shooting, you like this sniper game. Many different and skilfull sniper rifle.

FEATURES
High quality City graphics
Different Sniper Weapons
User friendly FPS Controller
Different missions scenarios
Combat mode

We will add new city and new missions every week. Stay tuned.
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
